member.name: ENCLAVE_INIT_INFO_VBS
member.summary: Contains architecture-specific information to use to initialize an enclave when the enclave type is ENCLAVE_TYPE_VBS, which specifies a virtualization-based security (VBS) enclave.

member.name: ENCLAVE_INIT_INFO_VBS.Length
member.summary: The total length of the ENCLAVE_INIT_INFO_VBS structure, in bytes.

member.name: ENCLAVE_INIT_INFO_VBS.ThreadCount
member.summary: Upon entry to the function, specifies the number of threads to create in the enclave. Upon successful return from InitializeEnclave, contains the number of threads the function actually created.
